languages.text: Древнее зенитное орудие расположено на шоссе, ведущем из звездной гавани к командному центру губернатора. Пока его контролируют повстанцы, полеты шаттлов над столицей неприемлемо опасны.

An ancient anti-aircraft battery is located on the road leading from the starport to the governor's command centre. While it remains under the control of the rebels, shuttle flights over the capital are too dangerous to countenance.
languages.original_text: Древнее зенитное орудие расположено на шоссе, ведущем из звездной гавани к командному центру губернатора. Пока его контролируют повстанцы, полеты шаттлов над столицей неприемлемо опасны.

traits.locale_text: An ancient cannon is located on the highway leading from the starport to the governor's command centre. While it's under the control of the rebels, the shuttle flight over the capital is nigh impossible.

An ancient cannon is located on the road leading from the starport to the governor's command centre. While it remains under the control of the rebels, shuttle flights over the capital are too dangerous to countenance.

An ancient cannon is located on the road leading from the starport to the governor's command centre. While it remains under the control of the rebels, shuttle flights over the capital are too dangerous to countenance.

An ancient anti-aircraft battery is located on the road leading from the starport to the governor's command centre. While it remains under the control of the rebels, shuttle flights over the capital are too dangerous to countenance.

languages.text: Ein altes Flugabwehrgeschütz befindet sich an der Straße vom Raumhafen zur Befehlszentrale des Gouverneurs. Solange sie unter der Kontrolle der Rebellen ist, sind Flüge über der Hauptstadt zu gefährlich.
languages.original_text: An ancient anti-aircraft battery is located on the road leading from the starport to the governor's command centre. While it remains under the control of the rebels, shuttle flights over the capital are too dangerous to countenance.

traits.locale_text: Eine alte Kanone befindet sich an der Straße vom Raumhafen zur Befehlszentrale des Gouverneurs. Solange sie unter der Kontrolle der Rebellen ist, sind Flüge über der Hauptstadt zu gefährlich.

languages.text: Une ancienne batterie antiaérienne se trouve sur la route qui relie l'astroport au centre de commandement du gouverneur. Tant qu'elle reste sous le contrôle des rebelles, le danger qu'elle représente empêche tout vol de navette au-dessus de la capitale.
languages.original_text: An ancient anti-aircraft battery is located on the road leading from the starport to the governor's command centre. While it remains under the control of the rebels, shuttle flights over the capital are too dangerous to countenance.

traits.locale_text: Un canon ancien se trouve sur la route qui relie l'astroport au centre de commandement du gouverneur. Tant qu'il reste sous le contrôle des rebelles, le danger qu'il représente empêche tout vol de navette au-dessus de la capitale.

languages.text: 一尊古老的防空炮坐落在星港到总督指挥中心的路上。只要这尊大炮还在叛军手中，穿梭机就根本没办法在首都上方冒险飞行。
languages.original_text: An ancient anti-aircraft battery is located on the road leading from the starport to the governor's command centre. While it remains under the control of the rebels, shuttle flights over the capital are too dangerous to countenance.

traits.locale_text: 一尊古老的防空炮坐落在星港到总督指挥中心的路上。只要这尊大炮还在叛军手中，穿梭机就根本没办法在首都上方冒险飞行。

languages.text: スターポートから総督の司令部へと続くハイウェイには古代の対空砲が設置されている。反乱軍の支配下にあるため、首都惑星上空のシャトル飛行は危険すぎて容認できない。
languages.original_text: An ancient anti-aircraft battery is located on the road leading from the starport to the governor's command centre. While it remains under the control of the rebels, shuttle flights over the capital are too dangerous to countenance.

traits.locale_text: スターポートから総督の司令部へと続くハイウェイには古代の対空砲が設置されている。反乱軍の支配下にあるため、首都惑星上空のシャトル飛行は危険すぎて容認できない。

languages.text: Hay una batería antiaérea antigua en el camino que lleva del puerto estelar al centro de mando del gobernador. Mientras esté en manos de los rebeldes, sobrevolar la capital sería un suicidio.
languages.original_text: An ancient anti-aircraft battery is located on the road leading from the starport to the governor's command centre. While it remains under the control of the rebels, shuttle flights over the capital are too dangerous to countenance.

traits.locale_text: Hay un cañón antiguo en el camino que lleva del puerto estelar al centro de mando del gobernador. Mientras esté en manos de los rebeldes, sobrevolar la capital sería un suicidio.

languages.text: Yıldız limanından valinin komuta merkezine giden rotada kadim bir havasavar bataryası yer alıyor. Bu silah asilerin hâkimiyetinde olduğu sürece, başkentin semalarında uçan mekikler için büyük tehlike arz ediyor.
languages.original_text: An ancient anti-aircraft battery is located on the road leading from the starport to the governor's command centre. While it remains under the control of the rebels, shuttle flights over the capital are too dangerous to countenance.

traits.locale_text: Yıldız limanından valinin komuta merkezine giden rotada kadim bir havasavar bataryası yer alıyor. Bu silah asilerin hâkimiyetinde olduğu sürece, başkentin semalarında uçan mekikler için büyük tehlike arz ediyor.
